channel-type.label: Repeater Mode
channel-type.description: Repeater mode of EnOcean gateway/device

channel-type.label: Set Base Id
channel-type.description: Set base id of EnOcean gateway. Use this with care! Must be between 0xFF800000 and 0xFFFFFF80

channel-type.label: Switch
channel-type.description: The switch channel allows to switch something on and off.

channel-type.label: Switch Channel A
channel-type.description: The switch channel allows to switch channel A on and off.

channel-type.label: Switch Channel B
channel-type.description: The switch channel allows to switch channel B on and off.

channel-type.label: Rollershutter
channel-type.description: Rollershutter

parameter.name: shutTime
parameter.label: Shut Time
parameter.description: Time (in seconds) to completely close the rollershutter

channel-type.label: Dimmer
channel-type.description: Dimmer

parameter.name: rampingTime
parameter.label: Ramping Time
parameter.description: A5-38-08: Ramping Time (in seconds), 0 = no ramping, 1..255 = seconds to 100%; D2-01-01: 0 = switch, 1-3 = timer 1-3, 4 = stop

parameter.name: eltakoDimmer
parameter.label: Eltako Dimmer
parameter.description: True for Eltako dimmer, false otherwise. Defaults to true for compatibility purpose.

channel-type.label: Temperature
channel-type.description: Current temperature in degree Celsius

channel-type.label: Humidity
channel-type.description: Relative humidity level in percentages

channel-type.label: CO2
channel-type.description: CO2 level in ppm

channel-type.label: CO
channel-type.description: CO level in ppm

channel-type.label: VOC
channel-type.description: Volatile organic compounds level in ppm/

channel-type.label: VOC ID
channel-type.description: Volatile organic compounds identification

channel-type.label: TVOC
channel-type.description: Total volatile organic compounds level in ppb/

channel-type.label: Set Point
channel-type.description: linear set point

channel-type.label: Occupancy
channel-type.description: Occupancy button pressed or released.

channel-type.label: Contact
channel-type.description: Contact channel

parameter.name: inverted
parameter.label: Invert Open/Closed
parameter.description: True for Eltako FPE-2, false otherwise.

channel-type.label: Window Handle State
channel-type.description: Describes the window handle state

channel-type.label: Window Sash State
channel-type.description: Describes the window sash state

channel-type.label: Window Calibration State
channel-type.description: Describes the window calibration state

channel-type.label: Window Calibration Step
channel-type.description: Calibration step that should be performed next

channel-type.label: Window Breach Event
channel-type.description: Is triggered 10 times in 5 seconds when the sensor detects a break-in attempt.

channel-type.label: Protection Plus Event
channel-type.description: Triggered when a Protection Plus capable device detects a break-in attempt.

channel-type.label: Vacation Mode Toggle Event
channel-type.description: Triggered when the vacation mode has been toggled on the device.

channel-type.label: Instant Power
channel-type.description: Instant power consumption in Watts

parameter.name: tariff
parameter.label: Tariff info
parameter.description: Number of tariff this channel listens to

parameter.name: validateValue
parameter.label: Validate Value
parameter.description: Filter out increases more than 10.0 kWh and decreases less than 1.0 kWh

channel-type.label: Total Usage
channel-type.description: Used energy in Kilowatt hours

parameter.name: tariff
parameter.label: Tariff info
parameter.description: Number of tariff this channel listens to

parameter.name: validateValue
parameter.label: Validate Value
parameter.description: Filter out increases more than 10.0 kWh and decreases less than 1.0 kWh

channel-type.label: Battery Voltage
channel-type.description: Voltage of the battery

channel-type.label: Teach In
channel-type.description: The teach in channel allows to send a teach in msg.

parameter.name: manufacturerId
parameter.label: Manufacturer Id
parameter.description: Id is used for 4BS teach in with EEP

parameter.name: teachInMSG
parameter.label: Teach in Message
parameter.description: Use this message if teach in type and/or manufacturer id are unknown

channel-type.label: RSSI
channel-type.description: Received Signal Strength Indication

channel-type.label: RepeatCount
channel-type.description: Number of repeaters involved in the transmission of the telegram

channel-type.label: LastReceived
channel-type.description: Date and time the last telegram was received

channel-type.label: Vibration Alarm
channel-type.description: Vibration alarm state.

channel-type.label: Lux
channel-type.description: Illumination in lux

channel-type.description: Illumination in lux

channel-type.label: Sun South/North
channel-type.description: Illumination in lux

channel-type.label: Sun East
channel-type.description: Illumination in lux

channel-type.label: Auto Off
channel-type.description: Automatically switch to off

channel-type.label: Delay Radio Off
channel-type.description: Delay switch off by radio for given seconds

channel-type.label: External Interface Mode
channel-type.description: This option is to selected the type of the wired switch

channel-type.label: Switching State
channel-type.description: Switch state according to specific on/off positions (otherwise toggle)

channel-type.label: Eco Mode
channel-type.description: Activates eco mode (disables certain messages)

channel-type.label: Angle
channel-type.description: Blind Angle

parameter.description: Number of tariff this channel listens to

channel-type.label: Rain
channel-type.description: Rain indicator

channel-type.label: Valve Position
channel-type.description: Indicates the actual percent position of the valve.

channel-type.label: Button Lock
channel-type.description: Enables or disables buttons on the device.

channel-type.label: Measurement Control
channel-type.description: Enables or disables temperature measurement on the device.

channel-type.label: Display Orientation
channel-type.description: Orientation of the display.

channel-type.label: Set Point
channel-type.description: Desired temperature

channel-type.label: Feed Temperature
channel-type.description: Water temperature in the radiator input

channel-type.label: Failure Code
channel-type.description: Failure code

channel-type.label: Wakeup Cycle
channel-type.description: Defines the cyclic wake-up time. The time corresponding to the number has to be looked up.

channel-type.label: Service Command
channel-type.description: Command to be sent to actuator

channel-type.label: Status Request Event
channel-type.description: Is triggered when the actuator wakes up from sleep and asks for the current status.

channel-type.label: Smoke Detected
channel-type.description: Smoke detection sensor state.

channel-type.label: Sensor Fault Mode
channel-type.description: Sensor activated fault mode.

channel-type.label: Maintenance Neccessary
channel-type.description: Sensor maintenance status.

channel-type.label: Out of Humidity Range
channel-type.description: Sensor analysis status: humidity out of range

channel-type.label: Out of Temperature Range
channel-type.description: Sensor analysis status: temperature out of range

channel-type.label: Time Since Last Maintenance
channel-type.description: Time since last maintenance was done.

channel-type.label: Remaining Product Life Time
channel-type.description: Countdown time until product end of life.

channel-type.label: Hygrothermal Comfort Index
channel-type.description: Comfort index based on temperature and humidity

channel-type.label: Indoor Air Analysis
channel-type.description: Indoor air quality analysis based on temperature and humidity

options.option: Humidity or temperature out of range

channel-type.label: Direct Operation Mode Control
channel-type.description: Sets the ventilation mode/level.

channel-type.label: Fireplace Safety Mode
channel-type.description: Indicates if device is running in fireplace safety mode

channel-type.label: Heat Exchanger Bypass Status
channel-type.description: Indicates if heat exchanger bypass is open (heat recovery inactive) or closed (heat recovery active)

channel-type.label: Supply Air Flap Position
channel-type.description: Indicates if supply air flap is open or closed

channel-type.label: Exhaust Air Flap Position
channel-type.description: Indicates if exhaust air flap is open or closed

channel-type.label: Defrost Mode
channel-type.description: Indicates if defrosting of heat exchanger is active or not

channel-type.label: Cooling Protection Mode
channel-type.description: Indicates if device is running in cooling protection mode

channel-type.label: Outdoor Air Heater Status
channel-type.description: Indicates if outdoor air heater is active or not

channel-type.label: Supply Air Heater Status
channel-type.description: Indicates if supply air heater is active or not

channel-type.label: Drain Heater Status
channel-type.description: Indicates if drain heater is active or not

channel-type.label: Timer Operation Mode
channel-type.description: Indicates if timer operation mode is active or not

channel-type.label: Weekly Timer Program Status
channel-type.description: Indicates if device is running according to configured program or not

channel-type.label: Room Temperature Control Status
channel-type.description: Indicates if room temperature control is active or not

channel-type.label: Air Quality Value
channel-type.description: Air quality value of first sensor in percentages

channel-type.label: Air Quality Value
channel-type.description: Air quality value of second sensor in percentages

channel-type.label: Outdoor Temperature
channel-type.description: Current outdoor air temperature in degree Celsius

channel-type.label: Supply Air Temperature
channel-type.description: Current supply air temperature in degree Celsius

channel-type.label: Indoor Temperature
channel-type.description: Current indoor air temperature in degree Celsius

channel-type.label: Exhaust Air Temperature
channel-type.description: Current exhaust air temperature in degree Celsius

channel-type.label: Supply Air Fan Air Flow Rate
channel-type.description: Current supply air fan air flow rate

channel-type.label: Exhaust Air Fan Air Flow Rate
channel-type.description: Current exhaust air fan air flow rate

channel-type.label: Supply Fan Speed
channel-type.description: Supply fan speed in revolutions per minutes

channel-type.label: Exhaust Fan Speed
channel-type.description: Exhaust fan speed in revolutions per minutes

channel-type.label: Rocker Switch Action
channel-type.description: Is triggered when a certain combination of rockers is pressed or released.

channel-type.label: Day/Night Mode
channel-type.description: Day (1) or Night (0) mode activated.
